iti39:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti39:2.1: “Mendicants, the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has two ways of teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.4: this is the first way of teaching Dhamma.
iti39:2.5: ‘Having seen evil as evil, be disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed from it’—
